comment: final gravity was 1.058 and I decided to scale the recipe down in all areas by 10% because I was limited to a 5 gallon carboy; I usually have a 6-6.5 gallon carboy available but they're all filled.
1.010 and contaminated with super attenuating wild bacteria strain; probably the same strain infected in the barrel. Oh well, hopefully the mouth-puckering sour will mellow over time though.
